data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Mexox-KMTWIQ7kNvgFfWGds&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCVmQDzEjPe-moN63LOycuZtlcTLaSpnKWbPd5NX1PIeQ&oe=666C27B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=1BpEDQ7ZZGwQ7kNvgFXqXT8&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDnlk6AVvSVuzlbNL4h5977gOAweX8Js_w8Pz5UW4LW-Q&oe=666C3552)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=iaVcZi8brTEQ7kNvgGsTJw2&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDcPCkaEh4pSQMA_VqBvlkdmnxAmJLmtSbK0MSNWg-4Gg&oe=666C2089)
